TopicTitle: Can someone tell me the name of this song?

Articles.Content:
I'm hoping someone can tell me what song this is but I can't figure it out even with google,

If you get the movie battleship from like 2012 or so on a DVD and get to the main menu thing, can anyone tell me what song that is that plays on the main menu?

Google brings up nothing, even from the list of songs in the movie on wikipedia or whatever its called, I know I'll recognize it when I hear it,
